EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Business Aviation Newsletter - January 2018 Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER January 2018 TPE331-12RJ ENGINE DELIVERS CARAVANS OF SKY DIVERS National Skydive Center found that the original PT6 engine in its Cessna Grand Caravan 208 lacked horsepower for climbing performance and ran a little bit too hot. The center decided to upgrade to the Honeywell TPE331-12JR engine...
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/case-studies/2018/january/tpe331-powers-national-skydive-center-s-ultimate-jump-ship]]> Honeywell's Flight Services to offer Future Air Navigation System testing Honeywell’s GoDirect Datalink service now includes Future Air Navigation System testing for general and business aviation customers...
Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2018/january/honeywell-expands-flight-services-to-offer-future-air-navigation-system-testing]]>. Time is running short, upgrade your XPDR affordably now! Honeywell has the solutions you need at an affordable price, but you have to act now... Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/ads-b-mandates]]>. JetCity extends Learjet 40 / 45 life with Primus Elite DU-875 upgrade Supplemental Type Certificate The JetCity Engineering DU-875 LCD drop-in replacement STC is offered in three ways... Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/case-studies/2017/december/jetcity-extends-learjet-40-45-life-with-primus-elite-du-875-upgrade-stc]]> Watch video. <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qx3AZ66C8Yk]]> MyAerospace Portal makes it easy to connect with Honeywell Honeywell’s MyAerospace Portal provides immediate access to your parts and repair information and a wide range of services, support and technical information... Take me to MyAerospace Portal now! <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
